member.name: T:Data.Models.Payment
member.summary: Used to document the transactions made from tenants, i.e., paying rent

member.name: P:Data.Models.Payment.Id
member.summary: Integer, that serves as an identification number for the object

member.name: P:Data.Models.Payment.Tenant
member.summary: The tenant who made the payment

member.name: P:Data.Models.Payment.Amount
member.summary: The amount of money given by the tenant

member.name: P:Data.Models.Payment.Date
member.summary: Date of the transaction

member.name: T:Data.Models.Property
member.summary: The object tenants are assigned to and get their monthly rent decided by A single property can have multiple tenants

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Id
member.summary: Integer, that serves as an identification number for the object

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Address
member.summary: Name of the address of the property (Location)

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Beds
member.summary: Number of beds for the given property

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Rooms
member.summary: Number of rooms for the given property

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Area
member.summary: Area of the property, mesured in square meters

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Rent
member.summary: The monthly rent of the property

member.name: P:Data.Models.Property.Tenants
member.summary: Reference to a list of tenants, that live in the property

member.name: T:Data.Models.Tenant
member.summary: Entity that occupies a single property and makes payments

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.Id
member.summary: Integer, that serves as an identification number for the object

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.FirstName
member.summary: First name of the tenant

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.LastName
member.summary: Last name of the tenant

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.FullName
member.summary: The first and last name of the tenant, combined

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.Email
member.summary: Personal email of the tenant

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Phone number of the tenant

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.DateOfMovingIn
member.summary: The date, the tenant moved into the property

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.IsKickedOut
member.summary: If true, tenant is ignored

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.RentedProperty
member.summary: The property, the given tenant occupies

member.name: P:Data.Models.Tenant.Payments
member.summary: List of payments, the tenant has made
